children.name: select
children.description: Fires when a menu item gets selected.

children.name: deactivate
children.description: Fires when a sub menu gets closed and its animation finished.

children.name: activate
children.description: Fires when a sub menu gets opened and its animation finished.

children.name: open
children.description: Fires before a sub menu gets opened. You can cancel this event to prevent opening the sub menu.

children.name: close
children.description: Fires before a sub menu gets closed. You can cancel this event to prevent closure.

children.name: remove
children.description: Removes a specified item(s) from a **Menu**.

children.name: open
children.description: Opens a sub-menu of a specified item(s) in a **Menu**.

children.name: insertBefore

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to insert the new item before

parameters.name: item `Object|Array`
parameters.description: Target item, specified as a JSON object. Can also handle an array of such objects.

children.description: Inserts an item into a **Menu** before the specified referenceItem.

children.name: insertAfter

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|Element|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to insert the new item after.

parameters.name: item `Object|Array`
parameters.description: Target item, specified as a JSON object. Can also handle an array of such objects.

children.description: Inserts an item into a **Menu** after the specified referenceItem.

children.name: enable
children.description: Enables or disables an item of a **Menu**. This can optionally be accomplished oninitialization by setting the **disabled="disabled"** on the desired menu item html element.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **Menu** for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.> **Important:** This method does not remove the Menu element from DOM.

children.name: close
children.description: Closes a sub-menu of a specified item(s) in a **Menu**.

children.name: append

parameters.name: referenceItem `String|jQuery`
parameters.description: A reference item to append the new item in.

parameters.name: item `Object|Array`
parameters.description: Item to be appended, specified as a JSON object. An array of objects can also be passed.

children.description: Appends an item to a **Menu** in the specified referenceItem's sub menu.

children.name: popupCollision
children.description: Specifies how Menu should adjust to screen boundaries. By default the strategy is **"fit"** for a sub menu with a horizontal parent,meaning it will move to fit in screen boundaries in all directions, and **"fit flip"** for a sub menu with vertical parent, meaning it will fit vertically and flip overits parent horizontally. You can also switch off the screen boundary detection completely if you set the **popupCollision** to false.

children.name: orientation
children.description: Root menu orientation. Could be horizontal or vertical.

children.name: openOnClick
children.description: Specifies that the root sub menus will be opened on item click.

children.name: hoverDelay
children.description: Specifies the delay in ms before the menu is opened/closed - used to avoid accidental closure on leaving.

children.name: direction
children.description: Specifies Menu opening direction. Can be "top", "bottom", "left", "right".You can also specify different direction for root and sub menu items, separating them with space. The example below will initialize the root menu to open upwards andits sub menus to the left.

children.name: dataSource
children.description: The data source of the widget which is used to render its items. Can be a JSON object/Array that contains an item or an Array of items to be rendered.Refer to the example below for a list of the supported properties.

children.name: closeOnClick
children.description: Specifies that sub menus should close after item selection (provided they won't navigate).

children.name: animation.open.duration
children.description:
Defines the animation duration in milliseconds.

children.name: animation
children.description: A collection of **Animation** objects, used to change default animations. A value of false will disable all animations in the widget.Available animations for the **Menu** are listed below.  Each animation has a reverse options which is used for the **close** effect by default, but can be over-riddenby setting the **close** animation.  Each animation also has a direction which can be set off the animation (i.e. **slideIn:Down**).
